question: Where is the Pravasi Bharatiya Divas Convention to be held this year?
explanation:
This yearâ€™s Pravasi Bharatiya Divas Convention will be held in a virtual mode, on account of COVID 19 pandemic movement restrictions.
The virtual convention will be inaugurated by Prime Minister Narendra Modi. Pravasi Bharatiya Divas is observed on 9th January of every year that commemorates the return of Mahatma Gandhi from South Africa.
